editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-4v: Prayer to Jesus Christ, “I Prostrate to Your Divinity” እሰግድ ለመለኮትከ. F-8r: Prayer to the Trinity, “ I Beseech You, Father, Son, and Holy Spirit,” ተማኅጸንኩ: ብክሙ: አብ: ወወልድ: ወመንፈስ ቅዱስ: EMIP 1862, f–146v. F-33r: Prayer to the Trinity, “I Worship the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit, Who exist in Trinity Forever,” Incipit: እሰግድ: ለአብ: ወወልድ: ወመንፈስ: ቅዱስ: ዘይሄሉ: ዘልፈ: በሥላሴሁ: እሰግድ: ለአብ: ወወልድ: ወመንፈስ: ቅዱስ: ዘይነብር: ወትረ: በዋህድናሁ: እሰግድ:, arranged for the days of the week: Monday (8r), Tuesday (11v), Wednesday (16r), Thursday (19r), Friday (22v), Saturday (27r), Sunday (30v). , lower: Exhortation to daily prayer using the prayers prayed by Daniel and the three Children, Prayer of Mary, and others, written in a different hand. F-34r: Calendar of feast days and holy days of the year, written in a different hand and a different ink. : Another calendar of feast days and holy days of the year, written in a different hand and a different ink. Notes: (and passim) mentions the owner, ወልደ መድኀን.
